state: You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal! -= Corridor =- If you're wondering why everything seems so normal all of a sudden, it's because you've just sauntered into the corridor. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, there is no door. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, there is no door. There is an exit to the west. > -= Corridor =-0/1
next_state: You are carrying: a yellow onion, a yellow apple and a white onion. > -= Corridor =-0/2

state: You are carrying: a yellow onion, a yellow apple and a white onion. > -= Corridor =-0/2
next_state: -= Kitchen =- You make another one of your grand eccentric entrances into a kitchen. You smell a hideous smell, and follow it to a fridge. The fridge contains a fried pork chop, a green bell pepper, a red onion and a cilantro. You see a closed oven right there by you. You can see a table. On the table you can make out a cookbook and a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a counter. You see a fried yellow potato, a yellow bell pepper, a raw red potato and a tomato on the counter. You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a stove. The stove is conventional. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Hopefully, this discovery doesn't ruin your TextWorld experience! There is an open plain door leading north. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, there is no door. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, there is no door. > -= Kitchen =-0/3

admissible_commands: take green bell pepper from fridge
take yellow bell pepper from counter
